last_episode_to_air.name: The Scout
last_episode_to_air.overview: A scout from a prep school powerhouse comes to Lenwood in hopes of recruiting Matty, but Coach isn't about to let his star player go without a fight.

name: Hoops
overview: A foul-mouthed high school basketball coach is sure he'll hit the big leagues if he can only turn his terrible team around. Good luck with that.

episodes.name: The Pilot
episodes.overview: Coach Hopkins leaves his dignity and good sense at the door in hopes of convincing the high school's tallest student to join the basketball team.

episodes.name: My Two Dads
episodes.overview: Outraged that Shannon still hangs out with his dad, Coach goes looking for some sweet petty revenge. Matty struggles to bond with the team.

episodes.name: Ethics
episodes.overview: Worried he may soon be academically ineligible, Matty asks Coach for help passing his ethics class. Hmm, what could possibly go wrong?

episodes.name: The Sponsor
episodes.overview: The mighty Lenwood Colts have a new sponsor, and Coach Hopkins is none too pleased. Meanwhile, Shannon, Ron and Kirk set out to catch Coach in a lie.

episodes.name: Matty Gets a Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Thinking that Matty's new girlfriend may be a distraction to his star player, Coach sabotages the relationship — only to quickly regret his meddling.

episodes.name: Zen
episodes.overview: Coach finds enlightenment with an unconventional anger-management therapist. Scott is bullied about his past relationships.

episodes.name: The Strike
episodes.overview: Coach Hopkins weaves a tangled web when he bets big against his rival. Opal worries — justifiably, it seems — that the school may be haunted.

episodes.name: Death
episodes.overview: A school-based grief counselor gets more than she bargained for when Coach, Opal, Ron, Barry and Shannon all share their long-suppressed traumas.

episodes.name: The Road Game
episodes.overview: The team scores an invite to a prestigious tournament in Cincinnati. When Coach misses the bus, he's forced to beg a ride from Shannon.

episodes.name: The Scout
episodes.overview: A scout from a prep school powerhouse comes to Lenwood in hopes of recruiting Matty, but Coach isn't about to let his star player go without a fight.
